basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Sue Lynn Sasser Endowed Scholarship

description: The Dr. Sue Lynn Sasser Endowed Scholarship is open to students with a declared major or minor in Economics (or Energy Economics major), a minimum 2.75 cumulative GPA, and a minimum of 15 hours completed at the time of application. Students must include a personal statement outlining career goals and civic engagement. Eligibility Requirements Declared major or minor in Economics (or Energy Economics major) Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75 or higher Must have completed a minimum of 15 hours Personal statement outlining career goals and civic engagement

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
